Forwarded message from Charles Ehrlich <ehrlich at h-m-g.com>:


BookSurge is in the midst of a web site revamp.  I have given loads of
advice about their lousy interface.  The whole problem with the e-book
being accidentally released was because their author's ordering website
is suboptimal.


There are other book outlets (amazon.com) that should be able to order
the book in a few weeks.


Yeehaw!


-Chas
